いつもチャットワークアプリのご利用、ありがとうございます。
今回のアップデートでは2つの機能改善と細かい不具合に対応しました。

1. 組織名編集機能
以前よりユーザーの要望が多かった「組織名編集機能」を追加し、アプリから組織名を編集できるようにしました。ビジネスプラン、エンタープライズプラン、KDDI ChatWorkをご利用の方は共通の組織名を選択することもできます。

2. タイムラインのパフォーマンス改善
タイムラインで過去のメッセージを読む際のスクロールがよりスムーズに行えるようになりました。これで日々のメッセージチェックがはかどります。

コミュニケーションアプリとしてのリリース文を考えており、今回からこのような形の文章でお届けしていきます。

Thank you for using ChatWork.

In this update, we changed the order of search functions so that users can easily be searched when adding new contacts. When you meet a person who has a ChatWork account, please search them from the contact tab.
We also fixed other minor bugs.

We are working hard to improve our service. Thank you again for your support!

In this update, we made some enhancements to our share function and fixed some bugs.

・We increased the range of file types that can be shared via the Box app, etc., enabling you to send PDFs, Excel files, and the like as well.
・We made it possible to send just photos without entering message when posting with the share function via photo apps.
・We fixed a bug preventing text posting via Notes apps.

We also fixed some minor bugs.

To send comments or requests regarding the app, please go to "Feedback" in the Account > Settings screen.

We hope you will continue to enjoy our app and thansk for your support.

In this update we have made the message input area easier to use, and we have fixed a bug in the filter feature.

Improvements:
- Users can now use the To, Live, etc. functions without opening the keyboard

Bugfixes:
- Fixed a bug when users had another chat filter selected other than “All”, you would only be able to search the filtered chats.

To send comments or requests regarding the app, please go to "Feedback" in the Account > Settings screen.

Thanks again for your continued support.

Thank you for using mobile ChatWork app.

This update allows users to search through direct chats using a ChatWork ID. Up until now, users were only able to perform searches on direct chats by name, company, or department. However, this new ability to search by ChatWork ID makes the search functionality much easier to use.

We've also fixed some minor bugs.

To send comments or requests regarding the app, please go to "Feedback" in the Account > Settings screen.

We hope you will continue to enjoy our app and thanks for your support.

In this update, we provide an enhanced push notification function, which will enable you to set the time and days when you will not receive notifications!
This enables you to set up not to get push notifications outside weekends and working hours.

Also, you can now set up push notifications by device.
If you use ChatWork on multiple devices such as iPhone and iPad, you can now set up notifications differently for each device.

We've also fixed some minor bugs, so please update and use our app.

To send comments or requests regarding the app, please go to "Feedback" in the Account > Settings screen.

We hope you will continue to enjoy our app and thanks for your support.

On November 28th, we renewed our logo and changed the name of our service to Chatwork (previously ChatWork) to match our new corporate mission!

Our mission is to "make work more fun and imaginative", we will continue to update the app give you a better experience.

In this update are two improvements:
- The pin UI has undergone a change, we think it much easier to use now so please give it a try!
- You can now turn on and off the unread mail notification in the Settings menu.

To send comments or requests regarding the app, please go to "Feedback" in the Account > Settings screen.
Thank you for your continued support.

We have cut support for iOS 10 in this version of Chatwork. We thank you for your understanding. Please refer to the mailer or our support page with any questions you may have.

Improvements:
- Users can now check the profile of users in the join request screen
- Users can now jump to when a file was uploaded using the “Jump To Message” function in the file preview screen

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a problem starting in iOS 13 where emojis wouldn’t show properly
- Squashed a bug where URLs without http:// or https:// wouldn’t open
- When there was no internet access, nothing happened when you pressed the “Authenticate” button. To make it easier to understand it now shows an error.
- Users can now only enter a backup code only if the proper character count has been entered.

To send comments or requests regarding the app, please go to "Feedback" in the Account > Settings screen.

Thanks again for your continued support.

Chatwork now officially supports a theme feature that allows users can change the UI color. We have prepared a “Light Theme” and “Dark Theme” for users to enjoy. The “Light Theme” is the base white theme, and the “Dark Theme” is base black theme for saving battery on mobile and is easier on the users’ eyes.

In addition to the theme feature, the following improvements have been made.

Improvements:
- When sending ToALL, you can now see how many people will be notified.
- The pin button in the timeline navigation bar has been moved to Chat Information > Settings

To send comments or requests regarding the app, please go to "Feedback" in the Account > Settings screen.

Thanks again for your continued support.

In this update, we have made various improvements and bug fixes. For details, see the following:

Improvements:
- The password visibility button is now usable even when no text has been entered
- Group Chat permission settings for roles are now available in app
- Made it easier to see which message you jumped to in a chat
- On the task list screen, you can switch between “My Tasks” and “Requested Tasks” by swiping left and right
- On the add contact screen, after searching for new contacts you can view a user’s profile by tapping that user in the list
- After tapping a URL, work number, or mobile phone number on the profile screen the corresponding app will now open on your device
- A confirmation alert is now displayed before canceling some operations, such as creating a chat or editing a summary

Bugfixes:
- Fixed a bug where To and Emoji information was lost when copying and pasting text written in the chat overview, tasks, and profile in chat message input field.

To send comments or requests regarding the app, please go to "Feedback" in the Account > Settings screen.

Thanks again for your continued support.

The "Text Size" setting on the settings screen has been removed in favor of the system text size setting. From now on, please change the font size from "Settings > Display and Brightness> Text Size".

Also, the following bugs have been fixed:
- When there is an incoming Chatwork Live call on multiple devices, the incoming call screen continues to be displayed on devices other than the one that received the call
- The theme setting on iPad would not be set correctly
- Crash may occur when trying to display the chat information screen from a timeline
- Street addresses in a message may not be correctly displayed as a link
- Other minor display bugs

To send comments or requests regarding the app, please go to "Feedback" in the Account > Settings screen.

Thanks again for your continued support.
